remarks: The predicate "is a lattice line".  (Contributed by NM, 23-Jun-2012.)
statement:
islln3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
islln3.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
islln3.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
islln3.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
islln2 $p |- ( K e. HL -> ( X e. N <-> ( X e. B /\ E. p e. A E. q e. A ( p =/= q /\ X = ( p .\/ q ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A p q $.
$d B p q $.
$d K p q $.
$d X p q $.
